CHAT.comment: TAYLOR JAMES BLOATE, Petitioner v. UNITED STATES.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 12:59 p.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MARK K. STANCIL ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MATTHEW D. ROBERTS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF MARK T. STANCIL ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 2:01 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
